title: Insights Through Visualization - Analyze and Visualize Your MarkLogic Data
abstract: Data visualization allows you to communicate sophisticated concepts over large data sets in ways that are readily consumable by end users. A successful visualization allows an analyst to quickly understand data in order to make decisions. MarkLogic is the best platform for building real-time operational applications on Big Data. Come learn how you can add rich, interactive visualizations to these applications with little or no code. Weâ€™ll demonstrate how to easily integrate interactive HTML5 maps, heatmaps, histograms, and pivot tables into your Big Data applications and show some real examples.

surveys.comments: How did you know I needed this? :-)
More in depth information would be helpful-I wouldn't expect anyone in the session not knowing why visualization is good-could have left that piece out
Justin was good but Micah was only a fair speaker
